extendedInfo.description: Search for the ghosts & record the proof!You must have seen "supernatural" TV series or other paranormal activity related TV shows. The devices used in those will cost you hundreds of dollars in market. This app costs a lot less & does a lot more than those devices.*** This is lite version supported by ads ***The app uses built in sensors in android phone to detect ghosts.Features1. Real time EMF & EVP(EMF - is magnetic reading. EVP - is the electronic noise caused due to ghosts)2. Graphs. Two modes. Simple & Detailed. 3. Records everything - EMF, EVP & graph.4. Store & backup all records.5. Beep sound for proper navigation. Sound intensifies as distance between you & ghosts reduces.6. LED type display for proper notification7. Readings in both - Tesla & Gauss8. Sensitivity can be customized as your requirement9. Customized audio player to listen to EVP10. Customized video player to play EMF readings along with graph.There is more. The app has killer looks.We are constantly adding more required features to the app, so dive in!Note - We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running we are using a search service to generate some revenue from this free app. This app will add a couple search links on your device in the form of an icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You may delete them easily (drag to the trash or delete the link for the browser), if you choose to use them, thanks!

reviews.title: Awful!
reviews.comment: This was a favorite app of mine that I showed and used often until the recent update now I\'m getting programs appearing everywhere! You want to show adds that\'s fine, I\'ve clicked my fair share but don\'t take over my phone with malware! I\'m really disappointed
reviews.author: Joshua Walker

reviews.comment: To me it doesn\'t even matter about the ads personally I just delete and or hide them. But let me tell you out of anything I have ever used this app really does work. Me and my boyfriend have to go to the laundry mat to wash clothes as we do not have a wash or dryer of our own.  Well tonight my boyfriend stayed home and I used the recorder on here and caught a young womans voice when I place this on top of my car. Now my car is an older car that is an 1984 and it was wrecked before I got it. I\'m thinking maybe it was the woman who died in the accident because you can hear the female voice clear as day say \"help me\"
reviews.author: Shiloh K

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: This is bad when you first download the app and open it up and there is an ad waiting already. You can\'t do anything with the original app until you play and download the ad. Really???! But what is the worst part is the app froze my phone after installation and trying to open it. Really bad app!
reviews.author: Christine Oakes

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Sucks! Freezes my phone every time i try to use it. Wouldn\'t even give it one star if i didn\'t have too. Needless to say uninstalling
reviews.author: BJ Lewis

reviews.title: More ads than app
reviews.comment: Bombards you with ads. Totally not worth it, even for a free app.
reviews.author: Kristen Malek

reviews.title: New adds are ridiculous
reviews.comment: I love the app and understand the whole adds in the app but it adds icons to my home screen and my notification tray that\'s a bit much so until this gets fixed I\'m uninstalling...
reviews.author: Greg Burdine

reviews.title: Terrible since update!
reviews.comment: Now am getting spam/scam since update! Going to uninstall!
reviews.author: Heidi Lynn

reviews.title: LoL
reviews.comment: Freaked out my wife BAD she almost cried lol

reviews.title: Boo !

reviews.title: Scary Coool!
reviews.comment: Im at a friends house, and we recorded an Evp for fun, and we were ina quiet room when we heard, Can you see the cat? And clearly hear, \'Whatd you say?\' Chills!
reviews.author: Alexis Poniewierski

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Expect adds from something free, emf readings are good, evp could be louder. I personaly believe the bad reviews are from skeptics and other app developers.

reviews.title: Terrible!!
reviews.comment: Within 2 minutes of installation it replaced icons on my home screen, and completely froze my phone twice.

reviews.title: Ooh dear
